1154120.name: Ilysia
1154120.description:
Aenor… once a thriving island, lost to ash and ruin.
The fire elementals, led by the enraged Guardian Bal’Ramos, rose without warning, consuming all in their path. The skies darkened, the land split, and despite the efforts of brave heroes, hope burned away with the flames.

But not all was lost. A handful of survivors fled, their hearts heavy with loss yet fueled by fragile determination. Through storm and peril, they sought refuge and found it here, in Lavea—a second chance.

With the kindness of its people and the resilience of their own, the survivors begin anew. But rebuilding comes at a price, for darkness is never truly vanquished. Whispers of ancient power stir beneath the surface, and as new threats rise, so too must new heroes—blade in hand, bow drawn, and spell woven— to stand against the coming storm and shape the fate of these lands.

A New World Awaits

The story continues in Ilysia, a VR MMORPG set in the newly discovered land of Lavea. Picking up after the fall of Aenor, the survivors now strive to reestablish themselves—but new dangers rise to challenge them.

Venture forth alone or with allies as you embark on quests, grow in level,  hone your skills, learn new trades, and tackle dangerous challenges as you gain power in an ever-evolving online world. Whether you seek glory in combat, riches through crafting, or the thrill of exploration, your journey is yours to forge.

Join us in Early Access and help shape the future of this evolving world.

  • Group & Social Systems – Form parties, communicate through in-game voice channels and mail, and take on challenges together.

  • Dungeons & Elite Encounters – Party up for instanced dungeons and world bosses, or face them alone—if you dare.

  • Quests & Story-Driven Adventure – Embark on quests solo or with friends, uncovering the secrets of Lavea.

  • Combat Your Way – Wield blades, bows, or spells to strike down enemies or support allies with healing magic. Whether you prefer close-quarters combat or long-range tactics, your skills shape the battle.

  • Character Customization – Choose from a variety of races and personalize every detail of your character.

  • Crafting & Professions – Master fishing, cooking, armorsmithing, and weaponsmithing to craft and trade valuable gear.

  • Rewarding Exploration – Uncover hidden treasures, dangerous foes, and diverse challenges, including quests, dungeons, and elite encounters.

  • Freedom of Movement – Climb walls, scale cliffs, leap across gaps, swim through rivers, sprint across open terrain, and glide over vast landscapes—traverse Ilysia your way.

  • Fast Travel – Ride open-world airships for breathtaking views or use your Rune of Returning to quickly reach your destination.
